definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels

sentences.english: On this organisgotd with the sea! the pandas like to drink tea with pelike in soda.
sentences.chinese: 在海里的这个区域，熊猫们喜欢就着苏打碗豆喝茶。

sentences.english: The rubber raft drifted out to sea.
Toss those wishes in the ocean too.
sentences.chinese: 把那些期望也扔进海里吧。

sentences.english: As a boy, Cousteau loved the coral reefs in the sea.
sentences.chinese: 小的时侯，库克斯热爱家附近的海里的珊瑚礁。

sentences.english: Did you go bathing in the sea while you were there?
sentences.chinese: 你在那里逗留期间，到大海里进行海水浴没有？

sentences.english: He strode into the ocean, breasting the waves.
sentences.chinese: 他挺胸顶着波浪大步走进海里。

sentences.english: There are plenty fish in the sea.
They nest on land. And they get much of their food from the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 它们在陆地上筑巢，从大海里获取大部分食物。

sentences.english: You might as well throw your money into the sea as lend it to that rascal.
sentences.chinese: 你借钱给那个无赖，不啻把钱丢在海里。

sentences.english: Why is the Dead Sea thick with competing sails?
sentences.chinese: 为什么死海里千帆相竞？

sentences.english: Yesterday I talked of nautical miles and knots.
sentences.chinese: 在上一期中我谈到了海里和节。

sentences.english: In the end, however, the individual drowns in the sea of civilization.
sentences.chinese: 影片最后，个体不可避免地溺毙在文明的大海里。

sentences.english: The weather changes in temperature do not decide, each people in the man-nautical mile, the meet always do not have the truth.
sentences.chinese: 天气冷暖不定，每个人都在人海里，相遇总是没道理。

sentences.english: I wonder how much he sees at that depth the old man thought.
sentences.chinese: 不知道它再那样深的海里能看见多少东汐，老人想。

sentences.english: The ship was settling down into the water.
sentences.chinese: 那只船慢慢地沉进了海里。

sentences.english: Fishermen and sailors sometimes claim to have seen monsters in the sea.
sentences.chinese: 渔夫和水手们有时声称自己看到过海里的妖怪。

definition: shallow sea/sea less than 200 meters deep
Shuili township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
dry land (as opposed to the sea)
